lead_paragraph: Malcolm Brodgon's Virginia teammates still bring up the winning 3-pointer he drilled at Pittsburgh two years ago, the one that won the game in the middle of a 13-game winning streak and propelled the Cavaliers to the ACC title.

headline.print_headline: No. 9 Virginia Pulls Away From Pitt 64-50
headline.main: No. 9 Virginia Pulls Away From Pitt 64-50
